statements: SELECT * FROM DemandPrediction;
SELECT product_id, demand FROM DemandPrediction WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, date, resources_allocated FROM DemandPrediction ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT MAX(demand) AS max_demand, MIN(demand) AS min_demand FROM DemandPrediction;
SELECT AVG(resources_allocated) AS avg_resources_allocated FROM DemandPrediction WHERE demand > 100;
SELECT * FROM DemandPrediction WHERE demand > 100 AND date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT product_id, SUM(demand) AS total_demand FROM DemandPrediction GROUP BY product_id HAVING SUM(demand) > 500
SELECT AVG(demand) AS average_demand, MAX(resources_allocated) AS max_resources FROM DemandPrediction
SELECT product_id, date, demand, resources_allocated FROM DemandPrediction ORDER BY date ASC, demand DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM DemandPrediction
SELECT * FROM historical_data;
SELECT id, date, demand FROM historical_data WHERE demand > 100;
SELECT date, resource_allocated FROM historical_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM resource_allocation WHERE quantity_allocated < 50;
SELECT date, quantity_allocated FROM resource_allocation WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-03-31';
SELECT id, date, demand FROM historical_data WHERE demand > 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY demand ASC;
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE resource_allocated = 0 AND date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT rh.id, rh.date, ra.quantity_allocated FROM historical_data rh JOIN resource_allocation ra ON rh.id = ra.resource_id WHERE ra.quantity_allocated > 50 ORDER BY rh.date ASC;
SELECT id, date, demand, resource_allocated FROM historical_data WHERE demand < 50 AND resource_allocated > 0 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM historical_sales WHERE sales_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM historical_sales GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT product_id, AVG(sales_amount) AS avg_sales FROM historical_sales GROUP BY product_id HAVING avg_sales > 500;
SELECT product_id, sales_date FROM historical_sales WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sales_date DESC;

SELECT r.resource_id, r.allocation_date, a.forecast_date FROM resource_allocation r INNER JOIN demand_forecast a ON r.resource_id = a.product_id WHERE r.allocated_amount > a.forecasted_demand ORDER BY r.allocation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM historical_sales ORDER BY sales_date DESC, sales_amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM historical_sales GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_sales > 10000;
SELECT product_id, forecast_date, forecasted_demand FROM demand_forecast WHERE forecasted_demand >= 50 ORDER BY forecast_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM historical_sales JOIN demand_forecast ON historical_sales.product_id = demand_forecast.product_id WHERE sales_amount > 5000 AND forecasted_demand < 50;
SELECT resource_id, MAX(allocated_amount) AS max_allocation FROM resource_allocation GROUP BY resource_id ORDER BY max_allocation DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM HistoricalSales;
SELECT sale_id, product_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM HistoricalSales;
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM ProductInventory;
SELECT forecast_date, predicted_demand FROM DemandForecast WHERE predicted_demand > 100;
SELECT allocation_date, allocated_quantity FROM ResourceAllocation ORDER BY allocation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM HistoricalSales ORDER BY sale_date DESC, sale_amount ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM ProductInventory WHERE quantity_in_stock > 100 ORDER BY quantity_in_stock DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT product_id, SUM(allocated_quantity) AS total_allocated_quantity FROM ResourceAllocation GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_allocated_quantity > 500 ORDER BY total_allocated_quantity DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_id, AVG(predicted_demand) AS avg_demand FROM DemandForecast GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY avg_demand DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM HistoricalSales JOIN ProductInventory ON HistoricalSales.product_id = ProductInventory.product_id WHERE sale_amount > 500 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM historical_data;
SELECT id, date, demand FROM historical_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, predicted_demand FROM demand_predictions WHERE predicted_demand > 100;
SELECT resource_name, quantity FROM resources WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT id, demand_variation FROM demand_analysis WHERE analysis_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM historical_data;
SELECT date, demand FROM historical_data WHERE demand > 100;
SELECT resource_name, quantity FROM resources ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT analysis_date, demand_variation FROM demand_analysis WHERE demand_variation < -5.00;

SELECT historical_data.date, resources.resource_name, resource_allocation.quantity_allocated FROM historical_data JOIN resource_allocation ON historical_data.date = resource_allocation.date JOIN resources ON resource_allocation.resource_id = resources.id;
